==== Accessibility Team Report for October 2010 ====

* Work continues on the Persona project
* Accessibility of Unity and the Ubuntu desktop is a key theme at UDS
* The importance of <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Bugs/Importance?action=diff&rev2=25&rev1=24|bugs affecting accessibility]]</nowiki> has been formally defined
* https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Accessibility got a new header this month. Many thanks to <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/cprofitt | cprofitt]]</nowiki> of the Ubuntu Beginners Team.
* https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Accessibility/doc/StartGuide was updated for Ubuntu 10.04 and 10.10.
